amendment.description: Amendment provides that the $106.6 million appropriated for IRS internal audit functions will remain in the IRS processing assistance and management account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the $29.3 million in funds appropriated in the bill to conduct an internal audit of the Internal Revenue Service and to increase funding for IRS processing assistance and management by $61.6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (CT) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
